blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: The Legacy Children.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wzi1w3

by Sistxh

Ben e Poe erano legati da una forte amicizia, entrambi figli di abili piloti, discendenti dei migliori guerrieri della Ribellione.
Ma i due migliori amici furono costretti a separarsi.
L'Oscurità inghiottì Ben Solo e sputò Kylo Ren.
Ma Poe ha da sempre conservato uno spazio nel suo cuore per il suo migliore amico.
Dal loro primo incontro fino all'ultimo.

Words: 4141, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Italiano

  • Fandoms: Star Wars, Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Poe Dameron, Ben Solo, Kylo Ren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Relationships: Poe Dameron/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Poe Dameron/Ben Solo, Poe Dameron/Kylo Ren


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wzi1w3

blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: Hard Ride.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2C6ZwEs

by Sistxh

Rey è intenta a concludere l'ennesimo scambio con Unkar Plutt, quando incontra Kylo Ren, comandate della Finalizer.
Ma vi è un problema; lo speeder di Kylo ha un malfunzionamento. Rey riuscirà a ripararlo?
Dal testo:
“La strinse a sé, il suo corpo era caldo e tonico, confortante al tatto. La sua mascella prominente si curvò con grazia, mentre la sollevava e la poggiava sulla sella dello speeder. Il suo corpo era scolpito, braccia forti, cosce e polpacci audaci, petto e addome fermi. Una meraviglia.
"Non credo che sia la cosa giusta da fare.” sussurrò Rey, scuotendo la testa.
Kylo poggiò la fronte fermamente contro la sua, percepì così tanta passione e dolore.
“Mi fai desiderare cose impossibili, Rey… mi rendi avventato” poi, la baciò.”

Words: 2213, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Italiano

  • Fandoms: Star Wars, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Rey, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2C6ZwEs

blog.name: gossamerrose
blog.title:
Fernandez // Design student.
Aspiring Illustrator.
blog.description:
Interested in illustration, design, and writing. Mostly sketches and drawings of whatever media I'm into at the moment - Star Wars, character drawings, Furuba etc. 
You can find me on instagram too (@f.ern_art).

summary: What are you smirking at?  Look behind you.   I like to believe that someone, maybe Ren, who knows, is going to save him. Or ...
caption:
What are you smirking at? 

Look behind you. 


I like to believe that someone, maybe Ren, who knows, is going to save him. Or  maybe I just wanna draw someone being beaten up because today’s that sort of day, and I draw Hux a lot so he becomes my poor guinea pig.


Dealing with people in life is exhausting. It’s the sort of day where you just lie in bed and hope the world goes away.

reblog.comment:

Look behind you. 


I like to believe that someone, maybe Ren, who knows, is going to save him. Or  maybe I just wanna draw someone being beaten up because today’s that sort of day, and I draw Hux a lot so he becomes my poor guinea pig.


Dealing with people in life is exhausting. It’s the sort of day where you just lie in bed and hope the world goes away.

Dealing with people in life is exhausting. It’s the sort of day where you just lie in bed and hope the world goes away.

Dal testo:
“La strinse a sé, il suo corpo era caldo e tonico, confortante al tatto. La sua mascella prominente si curvò con grazia, mentre la sollevava e la poggiava sulla sella dello speeder. Il suo corpo era scolpito, braccia forti, cosce e polpacci audaci, petto e addome fermi. Una meraviglia.
"Non credo che sia la cosa giusta da fare.” sussurrò Rey, scuotendo la testa.
Kylo poggiò la fronte fermamente contro la sua, percepì così tanta passione e dolore.
“Mi fai desiderare cose impossibili, Rey… mi rendi avventato” poi, la baciò.”

Words: 2213, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Italiano

  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

  • Characters: Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Rey, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren

title: The Good Neighbour
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Q3kTK2

by GenerallyHuxurious (GallifreyanOmnishambles)

Just because Dopheld knows every detail of his neighbours daily routine that doesn’t make him obsessed or anything. Even if the guy is gorgeous. In fact, his attention to detail happens to prove very useful when he wakes one morning to a total absence of noise from the flat downstairs…

Words: 2266, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
